page.title: 09Organisations-Winmarleigh(3)
page.content: {-Winmarleigh Playgroup- } This pre-school playgroup meets thrice weekly in the morning in the Village Hall.It has been in existence only some 2 years and seldom has had many more than a dozen on roll. However it was started to meet a need in the community and is a valuable link and asset in education in the village. {-Winmarleigh Women's Institute-} Meeting monthly in the Village Hall the W.I.,although not as large as its neighbours,has a varied programme of events and provides a vital meeting shop for the ladies of the rural area. {-The Field Day Committee-} The Field Day is dealt with at length below and suffice it to say that the event is organised weeks and months before the day by this hard-working committee.
